modules.cld.a_causal_loop_diagram_cld_is.en: A Causal Loop Diagram (CLD) is a visual representation of how different elements in your social-ecological system are connected through cause-and-effect relationships.
modules.cld.a_causal_loop_diagram_cld_is.es: Un Diagrama de Bucles Causales (CLD) es una representación visual de cómo diferentes elementos en su sistema socio-ecológico están conectados a través de relaciones de causa y efecto.
modules.cld.a_causal_loop_diagram_cld_is.fr: Un Diagramme de Boucles Causales (CLD) est une représentation visuelle de la façon dont différents éléments de votre système socio-écologique sont connectés par des relations de cause à effet.
modules.cld.a_causal_loop_diagram_cld_is.de: Ein Kausales Schleifendiagramm (CLD) ist eine visuelle Darstellung, wie verschiedene Elemente in Ihrem sozial-ökologischen System durch Ursache-Wirkungs-Beziehungen verbunden sind.
modules.cld.a_causal_loop_diagram_cld_is.lt: Priežastinių kilpų diagrama (CLD) yra vizualinis vaizdavimas, kaip skirtingi jūsų socialinės-ekologinės sistemos elementai yra susiję priežasties ir pasekmės ryšiais.
modules.cld.a_causal_loop_diagram_cld_is.pt: Um Diagrama de Loops Causais (CLD) é uma representação visual de como diferentes elementos no seu sistema socioecológico estão conectados através de relações de causa e efeito.
modules.cld.a_causal_loop_diagram_cld_is.it: Un Diagramma dei Loop Causali (CLD) è una rappresentazione visiva di come diversi elementi del tuo sistema socio-ecologico sono collegati attraverso relazioni causa-effetto.
modules.cld.a_causal_loop_diagram_cld_is.no: A Causal Loop Diagram (CLD) is a visual representation of how different elements in your social-ecological system are connected through cause-and-effect relationships.
modules.cld.a_causal_loop_diagram_cld_is.el: A Causal Loop Diagram (CLD) is a visual representation of how different elements in your social-ecological system are connected through cause-and-effect relationships.

modules.cld.it_helps_you_understand_feed.en: It helps you understand feedback loops, leverage points, and potential intervention strategies.
modules.cld.it_helps_you_understand_feed.es: Le ayuda a comprender bucles de retroalimentación, puntos de apalancamiento y estrategias de intervención potenciales.
modules.cld.it_helps_you_understand_feed.fr: Il vous aide à comprendre les boucles de rétroaction, les points de levier et les stratégies d'intervention potentielles.
modules.cld.it_helps_you_understand_feed.de: Es hilft Ihnen, Rückkopplungsschleifen, Hebelwirkungspunkte und potenzielle Interventionsstrategien zu verstehen.
modules.cld.it_helps_you_understand_feed.lt: Tai padeda suprasti grįžtamojo ryšio kilpas, sverto taškus ir galimas intervencijos strategijas.
modules.cld.it_helps_you_understand_feed.pt: Ajuda você a entender loops de feedback, pontos de alavancagem e estratégias de intervenção potenciais.
modules.cld.it_helps_you_understand_feed.it: Ti aiuta a comprendere i loop di feedback, i punti di leva e le potenziali strategie di intervento.
modules.cld.it_helps_you_understand_feed.no: It helps you understand feedback loops, leverage points, and potential intervention strategies.
modules.cld.it_helps_you_understand_feed.el: It helps you understand feedback loops, leverage points, and potential intervention strategies.

modules.cld.polarity_means_the_elements_.en: Polarity: + means the elements change in the same direction, - means they change in opposite directions
modules.cld.polarity_means_the_elements_.es: Polaridad: + significa que los elementos cambian en la misma dirección, - significa que cambian en direcciones opuestas
modules.cld.polarity_means_the_elements_.fr: Polarité: + signifie que les éléments changent dans la même direction, - signifie qu'ils changent dans des directions opposées
modules.cld.polarity_means_the_elements_.de: Polarität: + bedeutet, dass sich die Elemente in die gleiche Richtung ändern, - bedeutet, dass sie sich in entgegengesetzte Richtungen ändern
modules.cld.polarity_means_the_elements_.lt: Polaritetas: + reiškia, kad elementai keičiasi ta pačia kryptimi, - reiškia, kad jie keičiasi priešingomis kryptimis
modules.cld.polarity_means_the_elements_.pt: Polaridade: + significa que os elementos mudam na mesma direção, - significa que eles mudam em direções opostas
modules.cld.polarity_means_the_elements_.it: Polarità: + significa che gli elementi cambiano nella stessa direzione, - significa che cambiano in direzioni opposte
modules.cld.polarity_means_the_elements_.no: Polarity: + means the elements change in the same direction, - means they change in opposite directions
modules.cld.polarity_means_the_elements_.el: Polarity: + means the elements change in the same direction, - means they change in opposite directions

modules.cld.choose_between_hierarchical_.en: Choose between hierarchical, physics-based, or circular layouts to better understand different aspects of your system
modules.cld.choose_between_hierarchical_.es: Elija entre diseños jerárquicos, basados en física o circulares para comprender mejor diferentes aspectos de su sistema
modules.cld.choose_between_hierarchical_.fr: Choisissez entre des dispositions hiérarchiques, basées sur la physique ou circulaires pour mieux comprendre différents aspects de votre système
modules.cld.choose_between_hierarchical_.de: Wählen Sie zwischen hierarchischen, physikbasierten oder kreisförmigen Layouts, um verschiedene Aspekte Ihres Systems besser zu verstehen
modules.cld.choose_between_hierarchical_.lt: Pasirinkite tarp hierarchinių, fizika pagrįstų ar žiedinių išdėstymų, kad geriau suprastumėte skirtingus savo sistemos aspektus
modules.cld.choose_between_hierarchical_.pt: Escolha entre layouts hierárquicos, baseados em física ou circulares para entender melhor diferentes aspectos do seu sistema
modules.cld.choose_between_hierarchical_.it: Scegli tra layout gerarchici, basati sulla fisica o circolari per comprendere meglio diversi aspetti del tuo sistema
modules.cld.choose_between_hierarchical_.no: Choose between hierarchical, physics-based, or circular layouts to better understand different aspects of your system
modules.cld.choose_between_hierarchical_.el: Επιλέξτε between hierarchical, physics-based, or circular layouts to better understand different aspects of your system

modules.cld.represent_elements_in_your_s.en: Represent elements in your system (drivers, activities, pressures, states, impacts, welfare, responses)
modules.cld.represent_elements_in_your_s.es: Representan elementos en su sistema (impulsores, actividades, presiones, estados, impactos, bienestar, respuestas)
modules.cld.represent_elements_in_your_s.fr: Représentent des éléments de votre système (moteurs, activités, pressions, états, impacts, bien-être, réponses)
modules.cld.represent_elements_in_your_s.de: Repräsentieren Elemente in Ihrem System (Treiber, Aktivitäten, Drücke, Zustände, Auswirkungen, Wohlbefinden, Reaktionen)
modules.cld.represent_elements_in_your_s.lt: Reprezentuoja elementus jūsų sistemoje (varomosios jėgos, veiklos, spaudimas, būsenos, poveikis, gerovė, atsakai)
modules.cld.represent_elements_in_your_s.pt: Representam elementos no seu sistema (impulsores, atividades, pressões, estados, impactos, bem-estar, respostas)
modules.cld.represent_elements_in_your_s.it: Rappresentano elementi nel tuo sistema (driver, attività, pressioni, stati, impatti, benessere, risposte)
modules.cld.represent_elements_in_your_s.no: Represent elements in your system (drivers, activities, pressures, states, impacts, welfare, responses)
modules.cld.represent_elements_in_your_s.el: Represent elements in your system (drivers, activities, pressures, states, impacts, welfare, responses)

modules.cld.select_a_feedback_loop_to_vi.en: Select a feedback loop to visualize circular patterns of influence in your system
modules.cld.select_a_feedback_loop_to_vi.es: Seleccione un bucle de retroalimentación para visualizar patrones circulares de influencia en su sistema
modules.cld.select_a_feedback_loop_to_vi.fr: Sélectionnez une boucle de rétroaction pour visualiser les modèles circulaires d'influence dans votre système
modules.cld.select_a_feedback_loop_to_vi.de: Wählen Sie eine Rückkopplungsschleife aus, um kreisförmige Einflussmuster in Ihrem System zu visualisieren
modules.cld.select_a_feedback_loop_to_vi.lt: Pasirinkite grįžtamojo ryšio kilpą, kad vizualizuotumėte žiedinius įtakos modelius savo sistemoje
modules.cld.select_a_feedback_loop_to_vi.pt: Selecione um loop de feedback para visualizar padrões circulares de influência no seu sistema
modules.cld.select_a_feedback_loop_to_vi.it: Seleziona un loop di feedback per visualizzare modelli circolari di influenza nel tuo sistema
modules.cld.select_a_feedback_loop_to_vi.no: Select a feedback loop to visualize circular patterns of influence in your system
modules.cld.select_a_feedback_loop_to_vi.el: Επιλογή a feedback loop to visualize circular patterns of influence in your system

modules.cld.show_causal_connections_betw.en: Show causal connections between elements. Arrow direction indicates the direction of influence
modules.cld.show_causal_connections_betw.es: Muestran conexiones causales entre elementos. La dirección de la flecha indica la dirección de influencia
modules.cld.show_causal_connections_betw.fr: Montrent les connexions causales entre les éléments. La direction de la flèche indique la direction de l'influence
modules.cld.show_causal_connections_betw.de: Zeigen kausale Verbindungen zwischen Elementen. Die Pfeilrichtung zeigt die Richtung des Einflusses
modules.cld.show_causal_connections_betw.lt: Rodo priežastinius ryšius tarp elementų. Rodyklės kryptis nurodo įtakos kryptį
modules.cld.show_causal_connections_betw.pt: Mostram conexões causais entre elementos. A direção da seta indica a direção da influência
modules.cld.show_causal_connections_betw.it: Mostrano connessioni causali tra elementi. La direzione della freccia indica la direzione dell'influenza
modules.cld.show_causal_connections_betw.no: Show causal connections between elements. Arrow direction indicates the direction of influence
modules.cld.show_causal_connections_betw.el: Εμφάνιση causal connections between elements. Arrow direction indicates the direction of influence

modules.cld.toggle_to_highlight_the_most.en: Toggle to highlight the most influential nodes where interventions could have the greatest impact
modules.cld.toggle_to_highlight_the_most.es: Alterne para resaltar los nodos más influyentes donde las intervenciones podrían tener el mayor impacto
modules.cld.toggle_to_highlight_the_most.fr: Basculez pour mettre en évidence les nœuds les plus influents où les interventions pourraient avoir le plus grand impact
modules.cld.toggle_to_highlight_the_most.de: Umschalten, um die einflussreichsten Knoten hervorzuheben, bei denen Interventionen die größte Wirkung haben könnten
modules.cld.toggle_to_highlight_the_most.lt: Perjunkite, kad paryškintumėte įtakingiausius mazgus, kuriuose intervencijos galėtų turėti didžiausią poveikį
modules.cld.toggle_to_highlight_the_most.pt: Alternar para destacar os nós mais influentes onde as intervenções poderiam ter o maior impacto
modules.cld.toggle_to_highlight_the_most.it: Attiva per evidenziare i nodi più influenti dove gli interventi potrebbero avere il maggiore impatto
modules.cld.toggle_to_highlight_the_most.no: Toggle to highlight the most influential nodes where interventions could have the greatest impact
modules.cld.toggle_to_highlight_the_most.el: Toggle to highlight the most influential nodes where interventions could have the greatest impact

modules.cld.visualization.highlight_leve.fr: Mettre en Évidence les Points de Levier:
